Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3fa03c67cfba062325cb6f4f4b5c1e642f1cffe.sol#625-655) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3fa03c67cfba062325cb6f4f4b5c1e642f1cffe.sol#646-655)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3fa03c67cfba062325cb6f4f4b5c1e642f1cffe.sol#639-655)

ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3fa03c67cfba062325cb6f4f4b5c1e642f1cffe.sol#172)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3fa03c67cfba062325cb6f4f4b5c1e642f1cffe.sol#198)
PresaleFundCollector.MAX_INVESTORS should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3fa03c67cfba062325cb6f4f4b5c1e642f1cffe.sol#720)
